mapper.select: SELECT pm.paymentCode ,pm.contractManageCode ,pm.slipNumber ,cr.serviceTotalPrice ,pm.servicePaymentDueDate ,pm.paymentSumRegistration ,ps.paymentState FROM k2_sw_paymentCheck AS pc INNER JOIN k2_paymentState AS ps ON pc.paymentStateCode = ps.paymentStateCode right JOIN k2_sw_paymentSum AS pm ON pc.paymentCode = pm.paymentCode INNER JOIN k2_sw_contractRequest AS cr ON pm.contractManageCode = cr.contractManageCode where cr.serviceRequestStatus = '승인' GROUP BY pm.paymentCode ORDER BY pm.paymentSumRegistration ASC;

SELECT c.clientId ,p.paymentCode ,p.contractManageCode ,p.slipNumber ,c.paymentEstimate ,c.paymentCharge ,c.paymentBalance ,c.paymentType ,c.paymentDate ,s.paymentState FROM k2_sw_paymentSum AS p INNER JOIN k2_sw_paymentCheck AS c ON p.paymentCode = c.paymentCode INNER JOIN k2_paymentState AS s ON c.paymentStateCode = s.paymentStateCode WHERE p.paymentCode = #{paymentCode};
SELECT p.paymentStateCode AS paymentStateCode ,p.paymentState AS paymentState FROM k2_paymentState AS p;

SELECT k.clientId ,n.contractCode ,s.paymentState ,c.contractState ,r.refundState ,n.refundReason ,n.serviceRegistrationDate ,n.serviceDeleteDate ,n.contractRegDate FROM k2_sw_normalContractState AS n left JOIN k2_sw_contractRefundState AS r ON n.refundStateCode = r.refundStateCode INNER JOIN k2_sw_contractState AS c ON n.contractStateCode = c.contractStateCode INNER JOIN k2_sw_paymentCheck AS k ON n.paymentCheckCode = k.paymentCheckCode INNER JOIN k2_paymentState AS s ON k.paymentStateCode = s.paymentStateCode;

SELECT k.clientId ,n.contractCode ,s.paymentState ,c.contractState ,r.refundState ,n.refundReason ,n.serviceRegistrationDate ,n.serviceDeleteDate ,n.contractRegDate FROM k2_sw_normalContractState AS n left JOIN k2_sw_contractRefundState AS r ON n.refundStateCode = r.refundStateCode INNER JOIN k2_sw_contractState AS c ON n.contractStateCode = c.contractStateCode INNER JOIN k2_sw_paymentCheck AS k ON n.paymentCheckCode = k.paymentCheckCode INNER JOIN k2_paymentState AS s ON k.paymentStateCode = s.paymentStateCode;

SELECT ps.paymentCode ,cr.serviceTotalPrice ,ps.contractManageCode FROM k2_sw_paymentSum AS ps INNER JOIN k2_sw_contractRequest AS cr ON ps.contractManageCode = cr.contractManageCode INNER JOIN k0_sw_mainBusinessCodeManagement AS mc ON cr.mainBusinessCode = mc.mainBusinessCode INNER JOIN k0_sw_businessRegistration AS br ON mc.businessRegistrationCode = br.businessRegistrationCode WHERE ps.contractManageCode = #{contractManageCode};
